bilingual.source: They can focus primarily on effort and not simply on ability.
bilingual.target: 他们可以主要关注努力，而不仅仅是能力。
他仅仅笑了笑，然后走开了。
她仅仅是不敢相信自己的眼睛。

bilingual.source: You simply need to follow the instructions.
bilingual.target: 你仅仅需要按照说明操作。

bilingual.source: The solution is simply to restart the computer.
bilingual.target: 解决办法仅仅是重启电脑。

bilingual.source: Simply switching to electric cars will not mean pollution-free cities.
bilingual.target: 仅仅改用电动汽车并不意味着城市不再受污染。

bilingual.source: Simply saying thank you doesn't seem enough in certain situations.
bilingual.target: 在某些特定的情况下，仅仅说声谢谢似乎是不够的。

bilingual.source: He wasn't simply a world-famous astronaut, he was my dad.
bilingual.target: 他不仅仅是一名世界著名的宇航员，他还是我的父亲。

bilingual.source: Artists do not simply assist scientists with their communication requirements.
bilingual.target: 艺术家不仅仅帮助科学家满足他们的交流需求。

list.abstract: simply（英[ˈsɪmpli]，美[ˈsɪmpli]），英语单词，副词，释义为直接地；简单地；仅仅。短语搭配为simply put（简言之）。例句为“It simply made her go frantic.（这简直让她发疯了。）” 其近义词为merely、fairly、just、only、but。

yingyinNormal.en: You are suggesting the Admiral violated every regulation he vowed to uphold simply because he wanted to exploit your intellect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是指将军仅仅因为希望利用你的智慧就违反了曾宣誓要遵守的所有规定。

yingyinNormal.en: And so, what I did was I simply ask our viewers, do what you can, wherever you are, from wherever you sit in life, giving your time, or your talent, your money if you have it, and they did, extend yourself in kindness to other human beings wherever you can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我所做的仅仅是号召我们的观众尽己所能，无论地域与地位，如果可能，请拿出你们的时间，智慧与财力，他们也的确鼎力相助，无论你在哪里，请为他人送去自己的仁爱之心。

yingyinNormal.en: My purpose, Christopher, Is to not simply avoid the destruction of the home that I love, but to create a Romulus that exists free of the Federation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的目的，克里斯托弗，不仅仅是阻止我深爱的星球被毁灭，而且还要在联邦之外建立一个新的罗姆兰星。

yingyinNormal.en: He was simply following the QRH.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不过是执行快速检查单的要求而已。

yingyinNormal.en: This family simply wanted a cheap servant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这户人家只想要个廉价仆人。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Powerful Presentations: Simply Stated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

yingyinNormal.en: This has been Powerful Presentations: Simply Stated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

yingyinNormal.en: A thousand pardons. I simply assumed you were the waiter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一万个对不起。 我还以为你是服务生。

yingyinNormal.en: Prefer a more passive route? How about simply watching TV?
yingyinNormal.zh: 想要比较被动的方法？不如就看个电视？

yingyinNormal.en: Is that thank you? I am simply acknowledging your difficulties.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是在说谢谢么？我只是在简要阐述你的为难。

yingyinNormal.en: Alan? Christopher's simply not moving fast enough. We should talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾伦？克里斯托弗就是运行地有点儿慢。我们谈谈吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Who you are is your brand, and saying that a brand is simply a name is like saying Abraham Lincoln is simply a name, Or Mahatma Gandhi, God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你，就是你的品牌，而说你的品牌，只是个名字，就像在说亚伯拉罕·林肯只是个名字，圣雄甘地，上帝只是个名字。

yingyinNormal.en: Come, come. We simply must commence with the slaying and such.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，来吧，我们得开始为最后的决战做准备了。

yingyinNormal.en: I simply called up the school and was told the headmaster was here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是有事到学校，而他们告诉我校长在这里。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Some more examples of young men who simply need a silver suppository?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些年轻人也是只要有银制灵药就能成功的例子吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Here we go again. If there's simply no talking to me, why did you call?
yingyinNormal.zh: 又来了，如果你懒得跟我讲话的话，那干吗还打电话给我？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not dying, you idiot! Dragon Warrior. I am simply at peace. Finally.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还没要死，你这蠢猪，神龙侠，我终于...能平静了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if you're looking for the moral of the story, you could simply ask.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是要找故事的寓意，你大可以直接开口问。

yingyinNormal.en: We had chips. I think she liked me. You don't know Faith. You simply do not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们吃了薯条。我觉得她喜欢我。你不认识费斯 。根本不认识。

yingyinNormal.en: What if they simply don't excite me? Well, just smile and think about koalas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我就是高兴不起来呢？那就想想考拉，然后笑一个。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adv. 直接地；简单地；仅仅；只不过；简直；简而言之；绝对地；完全地
n. 简明；简易；简单；自然；简朴；单纯自然的事情；简明易懂的事情

word_family.mean: adj. 简明的；简易的；简单的；结构单一的；低下的；谦卑的；智商低下的；蠢的；朴素的；简朴的

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize how easy or basic something is

examination_example.sentence: Airlines have <highlight>simply</highlight> changed the time a trip is meant to take.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 航空公司只是改变了一趟旅行所需花费的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Dickens and his publishers <highlight>simply</highlight> pressed on with a new artist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狄更斯和他的出版商只是继续用一位新艺术家。

examination_example.sentence: It's a reflection <highlight>simply</highlight> of people generally thinking well of themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只是人们普遍自我评价良好的反映。

sense_info_list.en: in a way that is easy to understand; in a way that is natural and plain

examination_example.sentence: Put <highlight>simply</highlight>, they're not really living at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，他们根本不是真正的活着。

examination_example.sentence: The findings do not <highlight>simply</highlight> explain people's tendency to befriend those of similar ethnic backgrounds, say the researchers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，这些发现并不能简单地解释人们倾向于和那些有相似种族背景的人交朋友。

examination_example.sentence: He had people <highlight>simply</highlight> rate their beauty compared with others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他让人们简单地将自己的美貌与他人相比。

examination_example.sentence: Waiting lists increase all the time and we are <highlight>simply</highlight> not building enough new homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 等候名单一直在增加，我们根本没有建造足够的新房。

examination_example.sentence: Either Entergy never really intended to live by those commitments, or it <highlight>simply</highlight> didn't foresee what would happen next.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要么Entergy从未真正打算遵守这些承诺，要么它根本没有预见到接下来会发生什么。

word_usage.usage: simply是不仅有副词“仅仅”，还有词义“简单地”。对应的形容词是simple“简单的”，动词是simplify“简化”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“仅仅；只不过”，指就是这样、只是如此，强调单一性。
意为“仅有地；只”，指只有这些、不超过，强调不多于。
意为“仅仅；只不过”，指仅此而已，并非其他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In the US, studies have shown that doubling the size of a road can <highlight>simply</highlight> double the traffic, taking us back to the starting point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国，有研究表明，将道路的尺寸扩大一倍，只会使交通流量增加一倍，从而使我们回到起点。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Simply</highlight> switching to electric cars will not mean pollution-free cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅改用电动汽车并不意味着城市不再受污染。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>simply</highlight> means there're too many elementary school teachers already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一现象只是意味着已经有太多的小学教师了。

examination_example.sentence: One luxury brand employee quit her job because she <highlight>simply</highlight> couldn't bear to see the destruction of unsold products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个奢侈品牌的员工辞职了，因为她根本无法忍受看到未售出的产品被销毁。

examination_example.sentence: In an image-centered and pleasure-driven world, Postman noted, there is no place for rational thinking, because you <highlight>simply</highlight> cannot think with images.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Postman指出，在一个以图像为中心、以快乐为驱动的世界里，没有理性思考的空间，因为你根本无法用图像思考。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>simply</highlight> don't need more poetry, gender studies, or sociology majors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们真不需要更多的诗歌、性别研究或社会学专业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 直接地；简单地；仅仅；只不过；简直；简而言之；绝对地；完全地
n. 简明；简易；简单；自然；简朴；单纯自然的事情；简明易懂的事情

word_family.mean: adj. 简明的；简易的；简单的；结构单一的；低下的；谦卑的；智商低下的；蠢的；朴素的；简朴的

examination_example.sentence: Alexandra Johnstone, professor of appetite research at the University of Aberdeen, argues that it may <highlight>simply</highlight> be because breakfast-skippers have been found to be less knowledgeable about nutrition and health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿伯丁大学食欲研究教授 Alexandra Johnstone 认为，这可能只是因为不吃早餐的人，对营养和健康的知识了解比较少。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the access codes he's purchased have been required <highlight>simply</highlight> to complete homework or quizzes. Often it's only 10% of your grade in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他购买的许多访问代码仅仅是为了完成作业或测验而被要求使用。这往往只占你上课成绩的10%。

examination_example.sentence: Often, people break laws <highlight>simply</highlight> because the laws are there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常，人们违反法律只是因为法律存在。

examination_example.sentence: In this case, what didn't kill them <highlight>simply</highlight> didn't matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，什么不能杀死他们的确不重要了。

examination_example.sentence: The imbalance between work and life <highlight>simply</highlight> doesn't exist anymore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作和生活之间的不平衡已经不存在了。

examination_example.sentence: Textbook publishers connect professors, instructors and students in ways that alternatives, such as open e-textbooks and open educational resources, <highlight>simply</highlight> do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书出版商将教授、教师和学生联系在一起，这是其他替代性选择(如开放式电子教科书和开放式教育资源)根本无法做到的。

sense_info_list.en: in a straightforward or plain manner

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Simply</highlight> put, countries stick to darker and more conservative colors because they appear more official.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地说，国家坚持使用更暗、更保守的颜色，因为它们看起来更正式。

examination_example.sentence: It is a mistake to <highlight>simply</highlight> equate longevity (长寿) with issues of old age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地将长寿与老年问题等同起来是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: Yet that does not mean that <highlight>simply</highlight> extending our careers is appealing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这并不意味着单纯地延长我们的职业生涯就具有吸引力。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>simply</highlight> didn't get along.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们就是合不来。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>simply</highlight> can't afford it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我根本就买不起。

examination_example.sentence: "We can rule out that the dogs <highlight>simply</highlight> distinguish between the pictures based on a simple cue, such as the sight of teeth,".
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我们可以排除狗只是根据一个简单的线索来区分图片，比如看到牙齿，”他说。

examination_example.sentence: When your mind floats away, you <highlight>simply</highlight> come back. Don't blame yourself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你的思想飘散时，你只是回来。不要自责。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes people <highlight>simply</highlight> can't trust anymore. (They've been too badly hurt and they can't bear to let it happen again.)
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，人们只是无法再信任别人了（他们已经被伤害得太深而无法容忍这样的事情再次发生）。

sense_info_list.en: in a straightforward or plain manner

examination_example.sentence: Beyond <highlight>simply</highlight> satisfying a material need, he has provided an opportunity for kids in his neighborhood to learn how to fix their bikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了简单地满足物质需求，他还为邻居家的孩子提供了一个学习如何修理自行车的机会。

examination_example.sentence: If you are in need of a deadline extension, <highlight>simply</highlight> explain the situation to the professor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你需要延期，只需简单地向教授解释情况即可。

examination_example.sentence: Many boys would <highlight>simply</highlight> choose to run for a while, or play ball games.

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>simply</highlight> print the number itself.

examination_example.sentence: Here are some advantages of living <highlight>simply</highlight>.
